messages.messageBody:
Oops *sweatdrop* That's okay, I can fix that still. Then I can
convert the files to a PDF file.

--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "Hirotada Tokugawa"
<patriot014@h...> wrote:
> The following:
>
> May 11th, 1868: Ishin army makes final assault on Hakodate and
Goryokaku.
> Hijikata dies of a gunshot wound.
>
>
> Should be May 11th, 1869, not May 11, 1868.
>
> --M./H.
>

messages.subject: Correction! RE: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Re: Shinsengumi Calendar
messages.msgSnippet: The following: May 11th, 1868: Ishin army makes final assault on Hakodate and Goryokaku. Hijikata dies of a gunshot wound. Should be May 11th, 1869, not May
messages.messageBody:
The following:

May 11th, 1868: Ishin army makes final assault on Hakodate and Goryokaku.
Hijikata dies of a gunshot wound.


Should be May 11th, 1869, not May 11, 1868.

--M./H.
